title: epicmine
author: epicmine
created_time: April 29, 2023, 10:39:28 AMLast edit: April 30, 2023, 03:33:29 PM by epicmine
content: Mine the multi-algo coin Epic Cash on epicmine.io!Epic Cash's multi-algo nature (RandomX 48%, ProgPow 48%, Cuckoo 4%) allows you to save on electricity costs, or mine other coins simultaneously increasing your earnings.Our pool is compatible with any software that allows dual mining (e.g. SRB-Miner, TT-Miner).Stratum servers located in Europe and America (upcoming in Asia)Calculate profits on https://epicmine.io/calculatorTLS always available for every mining softwareDynamic hashrate-adapted job difficulty allocationAn easy-to-start miner configurator https://epicmine.io/get-startedPublic API https://api.epicmine.io/Dynamic mining fee allocation based on https://epicmine.io/rankingLearn more on https://epicmine.io/faq.Explore network on Epic Cash block explorer.

comments.author: Monarch B
comments.body: This project still alive, But trading volume to low in 24 hours. If I Use VPN Can I Mining EPIC?When launch Asia Version?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Monarch B on February 19, 2024, 04:31:24 AMThis project still alive, But trading volume to low in 24 hours. One reason to avoid it because I believe there is low liquidity and the price shit. What is the point of wasting an effort on something that is almost dead.Quote from: Monarch B on February 19, 2024, 04:31:24 AMIf I Use VPN Can I Mining EPIC?When launch Asia Version?In their formatting rules, I don't see any talk about VPN usage being illegal: https://epicmine.io/faq?
